about.firstP: Hi! My name is Camila, I am a creative and resourceful Full-Stack developer located in Argentina.
about.secondP: My strengths include the ability to work effectively as part of a team and being supportive of other team members.
about.thirdP: I highlight my positive and self-motivated personality and the fact that I am a fast learner who is always seeking to improve.
about.fourthP: Currently, I am looking for my first job as a developer to continue growing both professionally and personally.

gamerland.funcionality: Gamerland is an ecommerce of peripherals, such as mouse, keyboards, pads, etc
gamerland.fifthDescription: • Sort by price ascending or descending
gamerland.sixthDescription: • Search for specific products with an autocomplete option

task.funcionality: It is an app that allows you to keep track of the tasks to be done, in progress or completed, and all of them are saved locally with Firebase
task.thirdDescription: • Add tasks with their description and status (to do, in progress, finished)
task.fourthDescription: • Modify the description and status of tasks

pokedex.funcionality: It is a SPA, which makes use of a data API, and then part of the information is extracted and stored in a Database, (#PostgreSQL) so that it can be used later at convenience.
pokedex.secondDescription: • Filter by pokemon type and by user created pokemons.
pokedex.thirdDescription: • Sort pokemons alphabetically (A-Z, Z-A) and by attack strength.
pokedex.fifthDescription: • View the details of each Pokémon on individual pages.
pokedex.sixthDescription: • Create pokémons through a controlled form.

skills.title: Skills
skills.firstP: Developing fast web applications for seamless user interaction.
skills.secondP: Mobile-first, responsive design layout for all devices is a top priority.
skills.thirdP: I am constantly learning new technologies to keep up with the latest trends.

contact.title: Get in Touch!
contact.firstP: I am looking for my first opportunity as a developer. If you have a proposal to approach me, write me!
